metadata.synopsis: Minthara is present and gives the debrief to the player after the mindflayer colony.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up evil path -> Start the debrief.

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: | Ketheric is defeated, but his army marches on. To rid ourselves of this parasite, we will have to give chase. |
